    long[]
    getNineSliceBorders()
    An array of 4 dimensions for the up/right/down/left borders (in this order) when using 9-slice mode for `tileRenderMode`.
    If the tileRenderMode is not NineSlice, then this array is empty.
    See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9-slice_scaling
    double

    • getKeepAspectRatio

      public boolean getKeepAspectRatio()
      Only applies to entities resizable on both X/Y. If TRUE, the entity instance width/height will keep the same aspect ratio as the definition.

    • setKeepAspectRatio

      public void setKeepAspectRatio(boolean value)

    • getLimitBehavior

      public LimitBehavior getLimitBehavior()

    • setLimitBehavior

      public void setLimitBehavior(LimitBehavior value)

    • getLimitScope

      public LimitScope getLimitScope()
      If TRUE, the maxCount is a "per world" limit, if FALSE, it's a "per level". Possible values: `PerLayer`, `PerLevel`, `PerWorld`

    • setLimitScope

      public void setLimitScope(LimitScope value)

    • getNineSliceBorders

      public long[] getNineSliceBorders()
      An array of 4 dimensions for the up/right/down/left borders (in this order) when using 9-slice mode for `tileRenderMode`.
      If the tileRenderMode is not NineSlice, then this array is empty.
      See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9-slice_scaling

    • setNineSliceBorders

      public void setNineSliceBorders(long[] value)

      public double getPivotX()

    • getTileRenderMode

      public TileRenderMode getTileRenderMode()
      An enum describing how the the Entity tile is rendered inside the Entity bounds. Possible values: `Cover`, `FitInside`, `Repeat`, `Stretch`, `FullSizeCropped`, `FullSizeUncropped`, `NineSlice`

    • setTileRenderMode

      public void setTileRenderMode(TileRenderMode value)
